document_data.name: Bugbear's Cave
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bugbear's Cave''' was a pub that stood in the south-western part of [[Hillsfar]].
document_data.Services: The '''Bugbear's Cave''' offered several types of meals, catering to people of varied means. An average meal could cost up to 4 [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, the tavern was a crowded establishment, filled with gossips. The barmaids were happy to entertain visitors with stories and gossip for a generous tip. In 1358 DR, a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[fighter]] named [[Granite (dwarf)|Granite]] visited the Bugbear's Cave during his investigation into Hillsfaran stolen the jewels.
